com.example.myJoyStick

Class JoystickView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.example.myJoyStick.JoystickView

  • public class JoystickView
extends View
    JoystickView is a class that implements one joystick view.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    v5.0
    Author:
    Shmulik Melamed, Lital Motola

        public void setClickThreshold(float clickThreshold)
        Added in API level 1 Set the pressure sensitivity for registering a click
        Parameters:
        clickThreshold - threshold 0...1.0f inclusive. 0 will cause clicks to never be reported, 1.0 is a very hard click
